page.title: 09SKIPPING AND KING
page.content:
We play a game called skipping, you have a skipping rope that is a piece of rope.You have two people that hold the ends of the rope.Someone jumps in and the people that turn the rope sing.The person in the middle jumps over the rope.
We play a game called king.You have to stand in a circle with your legs apart.Then you bounce the ball in the middle if it goes though your legs you are king.You then have to throw the ball at the other people.The last person to be caught bounces the ball in the middle again.
